Jaws:



Jaws stopped swimming, staring at awe at the big ships in front of him.  He 
wondered if this was the Iron Fist and home of Zardus that Gotron had spoken 
of.

"Jaws, transform!" Jaws transformed to his biped mode, walking up to the 
shore, looking around for Gotron.
